Class Server

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Server
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Runnable

This is the main server class for the Shape Arena. Observed by ServerFrame.

Version:
2018-03-xx
Author:
Hasse Aro

SetupServer

public void SetupServer(java.lang.String port)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Starts the server and listens to the port given to it. Else throws IOException

Parameters:
port - The port the server listens to.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - The exception if it failed to start the server.

SetupObjects

public void SetupObjects()
                  throws java.io.IOException
Starts the Packet Handler and the Highscore Handler. Also creates the initial Food objects.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - Throws exception if something went wrong.

getConnectedUsers

public java.lang.String getConnectedUsers()
Returns info about the connected clients.

Returns:
Returns a string containing information about every connected client to the server.

run

public void run()
Handles client connections to the server by contantly listening for new connections and creates a new ClientHandler thread for each new player aslong as the server isn't full. When a new player joins, the server notifies the observers with all the connected players.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
